name: Photoonica
overview:
Photoonica is a web based service that lets users post and create fun conversations with photos.

The platform is much like twitter, except for photos. Users can add photos and reply to other photos. More interestingly, It lets users add speech bubbles ( different styles of bubbles such as speech, thought, star and square bubbles) with comments.

Registered members (or you can log in as guest) can reply to posts using the same images or new images. Users can also start new threads with already posted photos.

Social network sharing is integrated, in that users can share posts to their networks including facebook and twitter.

There is a facebook commenting feature included as well.

As a registered user, photoonica has options to set your posts private, which makes it visible only to followers. This also means that other users will need your approval before they can follow you.
